text: Opytnoye Khozyaystvo () is a rural locality (a village) in Krasnoyarsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 149 as of 2010. It comprises 6 streets. == Geography == It is located 23 km from Ufa, 2 km from Krasny Yar. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Opytnoye Khozyaystvo
